name: Find Me 0.5
description:
You set on a quest to find what sounds like you, but is it really supposed to be the way you think?

Controls:

WASD for movement

Mouse to point, left click to shoot

Tip: Use the controls to their fullest 💡

Game by Team Restless:

Shradha Agarwal, Trishala Gosar, Tanmay Karan, Rohit Agawane
